description:
If you hadn't noticed, Tommy definitely possesses a bit of kinkiness within himself. For this week's scene, he lets it all hang out, with none other than his lady, the beautiful Ruby Knox.

Tommy got Ruby in a blindfold, and then chained her hand to her feet in true domination fetish style. Once she was at his mercy, Tommy pulls out his rock hard cock and feeds it to her, making her suck and lick it before he turns her around and slams her deep and hard.

Throw in a little bit of whipping with leather tassels, a ball-gag and a huge cum shot, and you've got yourself another hot, kinky and quite awesome TommyD scene.

Enjoy!
title: Tommy D Loves The Chains
